questions.quote: You're taking that much to literally. Now sir , do you have any business to transact.
Yeah, yeah. Forget about all that. First thing is first. Warranty information. Name, we know that. Uh, hobbies. Skiing, racquetball...

So go ahead pigeons. hu hu hu. Laugh it up. I'm getting in my car now and the last I heard ... we have NO DEAL!
I have to wear it! The woman has orders for this shirt based on me wearing it on TV.. they're producing them as we speak!

Why're you doing this, Jerry? Is it your career? Things will pick up.
Well, uh, I'd watch the third base coach if I were you 'cause I don't think he's waving you in. You know I hate to say this but I think we're really hitting it off. Get it? Get it?
